price: Gömlekleri katrandandır. Yüzlerini de ateş bürüyecektir.
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
